mapper.select: SELECT d.name as name, COALESCE(COUNT(o.id), 0) as number FROM dish d LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON d.id = od.dish_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id FROM orders WHERE pay_status = 1 AND order_time >= #{begin} AND #{end} > order_time ) o ON od.order_id = o.id GROUP BY d.id, d.name ORDER BY number DESC, d.name LIMIT 10
select date(create_time) as day, count(id) as user_count from user where create_time >= #{begin} and #{end} > create_time group by day order by day
select date(order_time) as day, sum(amount) as turnover from orders where order_time >= #{begin} and #{end} > order_time and pay_status = 1 group by day order by day
